main event: An unidentified object was reported on June 11, 1959, traveling at tremendous speed and leaving a white fluorescent trail.
interesting points: The object disappeared almost instantly after being observed., The sighting involved rapid movement and a high altitude., The object was perceived to be too high to be a conventional aircraft or balloon., The object's trail evaporated instantly after its passage., The report was filed by a pilot acting intelligence officer at Ladd AFB, Alaska.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object with a white fluorescent trail
witness description: Henry J. Mehserele, 1/LT, 449TH FIS, reliable pilot acting as intelligence officer
